data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 9,541 believers in Chittagong.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Chittagong, Chittagong, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 7,606,859 lost in Chittagong that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 798 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Chittagong, Chittagong, Bangladesh.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Chittagong, Chittagong, Bangladesh to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Masalchi people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Masalchi people know you.
Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Chittagong, Chittagong, Bangladesh to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Chittagong, Chittagong, Bangladesh so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Chittagong, Chittagong, Bangladesh to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.
